nodes.text: The Desert Plain was a flat plain on Tatooine, located near the Dune Sea, the Arch Canyon and Beggar's Canyon. The plain was part of the Boonta Eve Classic racetrack and was considered as light relief from the other sections of the circuit.
During the podrace of 32 BBY, Phuii racer Mars Guo crashed in this plain after the cheating Sebulba tossed a piece of iron in one of the turbines of his podracer.
